name: tds-website
description: TDS Website - TypeScript project for Netlify

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets:
mkdir -p dist/assets/css dist/assets/js && cp src/styles/* dist/assets/css/ && cp src/scripts/script.js dist/assets/js/ && cp src/pages/*.html dist/ && echo '/ /index.html 200
/* /index.html 404' > dist/_redirects
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run copy-assets && npm run serve
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve

author: TDS
